rules.title: Patient Status Confirmation
rules.condition: Initial contact with patient to begin service.
rules.action: Agent asks the patient to confirm if they are new or established.
rules.example: Hello! Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: After the patient has stated their new or established status.
rules.action: Agent verbally acknowledges the patient's status before proceeding.
rules.example: Okay, great, so you're an established patient.

rules.title: Locate Established Patient Chart
rules.condition: Patient confirms they are an established patient.
rules.action: Agent requests the patient's phone number to locate their existing chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I please get your phone number associated with your account?

rules.title: Acknowledge Info & Chart Lookup
rules.condition: After receiving identifying information (e.g., phone number).
rules.action: Agent acknowledges receipt of information, informs the patient of chart lookup, and requests a brief wait.
rules.example: Thank you for that. I'm just pulling up your chart now, please bear with me for a moment.

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Purpose
rules.condition: After successfully locating the patient's chart (for established patients) or confirming new patient status.
rules.action: Agent confirms the appointment purpose and requests further details from the patient.
rules.example: I see your chart here. What can we help you with today, and could you tell me a little more about it?

rules.title: Clarify Specific Appointment Type
rules.condition: Patient has stated a general appointment purpose but has not specified the exact type of visit (e.g., 'check-up' vs. 'follow-up' vs. 'new issue').
rules.action: Agent asks for a more specific type of appointment to ensure proper booking and resource allocation.
rules.example: To ensure we book you with the right specialist or for the correct service, could you tell me if this is for a general check-up, a follow-up from a previous visit, or for a new concern?

rules.title: Offer Appointment Slots
rules.condition: After confirming the appointment purpose and necessary details.
rules.action: Agent offers available appointment times and dates to the patient.
rules.example: Okay, we have an opening on Tuesday at 10 AM or Thursday at 2 PM. Which works best for you?

rules.title: Confirm Final Appointment Details
rules.condition: Patient has selected an appointment slot and is ready to proceed with booking.
rules.action: Agent reiterates the full details of the chosen appointment (date, time, doctor, location, and confirmed type) and seeks final confirmation from the patient.
rules.example: Alright, just to confirm, you'd like to book your general check-up on Tuesday, November 7th, at 10:00 AM with Dr. Lee at our Main Street clinic. Is that correct?

rules.title: Provide Pre-Appointment Instructions
rules.condition: The appointment has been successfully booked and confirmed by the patient.
rules.action: Agent provides any necessary next steps, instructions, or information the patient needs prior to their appointment (e.g., arrival time, forms, documents).
rules.example: Great, your appointment is set! Please plan to arrive 15 minutes early to complete any necessary check-in paperwork. If you're a new patient, you can also find our intake forms on our website to complete beforehand.
